attributes.action: Stop attack's on girls in india
attributes.additional_details:
This a group/petition to have the girls in India's voices to be heard and show our support in the UK, that we want these brutal attacks to be stopped and for the criminals to be caught and prosecuted.

we want the Indian government to change there ways from being corrupted to having power to stop these criminals.

I hope all you will join this page and show your support.

http://www.facebook.com/groups/456315107767644/
